purpleculture_pinyin:
lǎn
to monopolize; to seize; to take into one's arms; to embrace; to fasten (with a rope etc); to take on (responsibility etc); to canvass
монополизировать; захватить; взять в руки; обнять; скрепить (веревкой и т. д.); брать на себя (ответственность и т. д.); агитировать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 揽)
Pictophonetic: 覽 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 覽 [ lǎn ] to look over, to inspect, to view, to perceive
heisig_chinese_memo: You can take on any detective case with healthy fingers and this state of the art magnifying glass.
Ru_trainchinese: lǎn: (глаг) охватывать (кого-то) руками; привлекать, брать на себя (ответственность); захватывать, монополизировать; привязать канатом, пришвартоваться

humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " view " sound. " Lan " is also called "擥". "Shuowen": "Zhi, hold it. From the hand, supervise the sound." "Ji Yun. "𠭖 Rhyme": "擥, or Cong Lan. " The original meaning of " Lan " is to hold and hold. "Release name. "Shi Zirong": "Let, grab, grab your hands." Such as "Hou Han Shu. Biography of Literary Garden: "Writing without any extra points in the essay, but with beautiful words." "Selected Works. Cao Zijian "Gift to the White Horse Wang Biao": "If you want to stay away from it, you will stop staggering."

" Lan " by extension means mastering and controlling. Such as "Hou Han Shu. The Second Record of Emperor Guangwu": "Although he is a great career, he is as cautious as he is not enough, so he can be cautious in the system of government, master the power, measure the time and strength, and do nothing." Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Shunzong Record IV": " Dezong has been in power for a long time, and he has taken charge of his own authority and personally manages small matters. If he loses the ruler, the prime minister will not be able to perform his duties."

" Lan " means picking and plucking. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. "Li Sao": "The Mulan Xi of the dynasty, the night of the sacred land." Wang Yi's note: "Land, picking. The people who can live in the water are called the continents. The grass in the winter is not dead, and the name of the Chu people is Sumang." Tang Acting Zhang Jiuling's "Five Poems": "Enjoying Fanghui in front of the court, and entrusting microwaves on the river."

" Lan " also means to raise. Such as "Selected Works. Cao Zijian's "Gift to Wang Can": "Sitting hard and thinking, embracing clothes and traveling to the west." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Paying Jixian Liu Langzhong to the moon to see the moon and Huaiyuan to send to the east of Zhejiang": "There are white-headed people under the clothes, and the night Up."

" Football " means lead, recruit. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Shu Shu. Zhuge Liang's Biography: "Generals are the clan of the imperial family, and Xinyi is written in the world, with heroes in total, and thirst for thinking and virtuous people." "New Tang Book. "Li Mi Chuan": "Hold the heroes of the world to control them, so that they belong far and near, and the public is not as good as me."

" Lan " also means hug. For example, Chapter 18 of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "Order him to come forward and hold him hand in hand." Chapter 109 of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "I'm afraid of freezing him, so I would put him in a blanket."

" Lan " means " view ", meaning watching. Such as "Zhuangzi. Zaiyou: "Those who want to be a country of man will take advantage of the three kings, but not see their patients." Lu Deming explained: "If you want to be a country, you can also read the book." Gold t <seven rounds> ":" embrace the infinite stream, to God day mother. "Annotation:" Yan Zhou flow Ferris and poor. "See" view . "
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " view " sound. The original meaning is persistence and persistence.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「覽」聲。「攬」亦作「擥」。《說文》：「擥，撮持也。从手，監聲。」《集韻．𠭖韻》：「擥，或从覽。」「攬」的本義是執、持。《釋名．釋姿容》：「攬，斂也，斂置手中也。」如《後漢書．文苑列傳》：「衡攬筆而作，文無加點，辭采甚麗。」《文選．曹子建〈贈白馬王彪〉》：「欲還絕無蹊，攬轡止踟躕。」

　　「攬」引申表示掌握、把持。如《後漢書．光武帝紀下》：「雖身濟大業，兢兢如不及，故能明慎政體，總攬權綱，量時度力，舉無過事。」唐代韓愈《順宗實錄四》：「德宗在位久，益自攬持機柄，親治細事，失君人大體，宰相益不得行其事職。」

　　「攬」表示采摘、摘取。如《楚辭．離騷》：「朝搴阰之木蘭兮，夕攬洲之宿莽。」王逸注：「攬，采也。水中可居者曰洲。草冬生不死者，楚人名曰宿莽。」唐代張九齡〈雜詩五首〉：「庭前攬芳蕙，江上托微波。」

　　「攬」亦表示提起。如《文選．曹子建〈贈王粲〉》：「端坐苦愁思，攬衣起西遊。」唐代白居易〈酬集賢劉郎中對月見寄兼懷元浙東〉：「下有白頭人，攬衣中夜起。」

　　「攬」表示招致、招攬。如《三國志．蜀書．諸葛亮傳》：「將軍既帝室之冑，信義著於四海，總攬英雄，思賢如渴。」《新唐書．李密傳》：「攬天下英雄馭之，使遠近歸屬，公不如我。」

　　「攬」還表示圍抱。如《紅樓夢》第18回：「命他近前，攜手攬於懷內。」《紅樓夢》第109回：「我怕凍著他，還把他攬在一個被窩兒裡呢。」

　　「攬」通作「覽」，表示觀看。如《莊子．在宥》：「而欲為人之國者，此攬乎三王之利，而不見其患者也。」陸德明釋文：「攬，本亦作覽。」《文選．枚叔〈七發〉》：「流攬無窮，歸神日母。」李善注：「言周流觀覽而窮。」參見「覽」。

攬 (Simplified: 揽)
Pinyin: lǎn
English Definition: to monopolize; to seize; to take into one's arms; to embrace; to fasten (with a rope etc); to take on (responsibility etc); to canvass
Total strokes: 24; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 覽 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 覽 [ lǎn ] to look over, to inspect, to view, to perceive

Chinese: You can take on any detective case with healthy fingers and this state of the art magnifying glass.
Meaning: take on
Hanzi: 揽
Story: You can take on any detective case with healthy fingers to hold this state of the art magnifying glass.
Kind: traditional

從「 手 」，「 覽 」聲。「 攬 」亦作「 擥 」。《說文》：「擥，撮持也。从手，監聲。」《集韻．𠭖韻》：「擥，或从覽。」「 攬 」的本義是執、持。《釋名．釋姿容》：「攬，斂也，斂置手中也。」如《後漢書．文苑列傳》：「衡攬筆而作，文無加點，辭采甚麗。」《文選．曹子建〈贈白馬王彪〉》：「欲還絕無蹊，攬轡止踟躕。」 「 攬 」引申表示掌握、把持。如《後漢書．光武帝紀下》：「雖身濟大業，兢兢如不及，故能明慎政體，總攬權綱，量時度力，舉無過事。」唐代韓愈《順宗實錄四》：「德宗在位久，益自攬持機柄，親治細事，失君人大體，宰相益不得行其事職。」 「 攬 」表示采摘、摘取。如《楚辭．離騷》：「朝搴阰之木蘭兮，夕攬洲之宿莽。」王逸注：「攬，采也。水中可居者曰洲。草冬生不死者，楚人名曰宿莽。」唐代張九齡〈雜詩五首〉：「庭前攬芳蕙，江上托微波。」 「 攬 」亦表示提起。如《文選．曹子建〈贈王粲〉》：「端坐苦愁思，攬衣起西遊。」唐代白居易〈酬集賢劉郎中對月見寄兼懷元浙東〉：「下有白頭人，攬衣中夜起。」 「 攬 」表示招致、招攬。如《三國志．蜀書．諸葛亮傳》：「將軍既帝室之冑，信義著於四海，總攬英雄，思賢如渴。」《新唐書．李密傳》：「攬天下英雄馭之，使遠近歸屬，公不如我。」 「 攬 」還表示圍抱。如《紅樓夢》第18回：「命他近前，攜手攬於懷內。」《紅樓夢》第109回：「我怕凍著他，還把他攬在一個被窩兒裡呢。」 「 攬 」通作「 覽 」，表示觀看。如《莊子．在宥》：「而欲為人之國者，此攬乎三王之利，而不見其患者也。」陸德明釋文：「攬，本亦作覽。」《文選．枚叔〈七發〉》：「流攬無窮，歸神日母。」李善注：「言周流觀覽而窮。」參見「 覽 」。

攬字的基本解释

攬
lǎn
见“揽”。

攬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǎn］
［《廣韻》盧敢切，上敢，來。］
亦作“擥1”。亦作“1”。“揽1”的繁体字。
(1)总揽，一把抓。
(2)执持；拉住。
(3)收取。
(4)采摘。
(5)延揽，结纳。
(6)指约集，拉拢。
(7)招引，招惹。
(8)拉到自己这边或自己身上；包揽。
(9)围抱，搂。
(10)把松散的东西聚拢。
(11)通“覽”。看；观赏。

攬字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　攬； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页465第06
【唐韻】盧敢切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】魯敢切，?同擥。見擥字註。

攬字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
攬字的起名意思

暂无。

Take care of

lǎn
See "Lan".
Take care of
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǎn］
["Guangyun" Lu Gan cut, go up, come. ]
Also known as "擥1". Also known as "1". The traditional characters of "親1".
(1) Overall, grab it.
(2) Hold; hold.
(3) Collection.
(4) Picking.
(5) Solicitation and settlement.
(6) Refers to gathering and drawing together.
(7) To attract and provoke.
(8) Pull to one's side or on one's own body; take care of.
(9) Hug and hug.
(10) Gather loose things together.
(11) Through "View". Look; watch.
